name.ja: <ruby>幻<rt>げん</rt></ruby><ruby>壊<rt>かい</rt></ruby><ruby>融<rt>ゆう</rt></ruby><ruby>門<rt>もん</rt></ruby>スクラップゲート

requirement.en: Activate this card by sending 1 face-up Level 7 or higher Wyrm Type monster from your field to the Graveyard.

effect.en: While this card is face-up in the Field Zone, if a player Fusion Summons by the effect of "Fusion", they can also shuffle only Wyrm Type monsters from their Graveyard into the Deck as material.
